vocabinfos.relatedNos: [{'strongNumber': 'H1315G', 'matchingForm': 'בָּֽשְׂמַת', 'stepTransliteration': 'ba.se.mat', 'gloss': 'Basemath', '_searchResultRange': '1Kgs.4.15', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '巴實抹', '_es_Gloss': 'Basemath', '_zh_Gloss': '巴实抹'}, {'strongNumber': 'H1315H', 'matchingForm': 'בָּֽשְׂמַת', 'stepTransliteration': 'ba.se.mat', 'gloss': 'Basemath', '_searchResultRange': 'Gen.26.34@Gen.26.34-36.16', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '巴實抹', '_es_Gloss': 'Basemath', '_zh_Gloss': '巴实抹'}, {'strongNumber': 'H1315I', 'matchingForm': 'בָּֽשְׂמַת', 'stepTransliteration': 'ba.se.mat', 'gloss': 'Basemath', '_searchResultRange': 'Gen.36.3-17@Gen.28.9-36.17', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '巴實抹', '_es_Gloss': 'Basemath', '_zh_Gloss': '巴实抹'}, {'strongNumber': 'H4258H', 'matchingForm': 'מַחֲלַת', 'stepTransliteration': 'ma.cha.lat', 'gloss': 'Mahalath', '_searchResultRange': '2Chr.11.18', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '瑪哈拉', '_es_Gloss': 'Mahaleth', '_zh_Gloss': '玛哈拉'}]
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A woman of the Arabs living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at Gen.28.9;
daughter of: Ishmael (H3458);
sister of: Nebaioth (H5032), Kedar (H6938), Adbeel (H0110), Mibsam (H4017), Mishma (H4927), Dumah (H1746), Massa (H4854), Hadad (H2316), Tema (H8485), Jetur (H3195), Naphish (H5305) and Kedemah (H6929); married to Esau (H6215);
mother of: Reuel (H7467); also called Basemath (KJV: Bashemath) at Gen.36.3,4,10,13,17;
Also named: bos.mat (בָּֽשְׂמַת "Basemath" H1315I)
§ Mahalath = "stringed instrument"
1) daughter of Jerimoth son of king David and wife, evidently the 1st, of king Rehoboam the grandson of king David
2) daughter of Ishmael and wife of Esau
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hija de Ismael; esposa de Esaú; (b)   hija de Jerimot; esposa de Roboam, rey de Judá 	érmino musical
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
瑪哈拉 这个陰性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "弦樂器"
1) 大衛兒子耶利摩的女兒, 大衛孫子羅波安的大老婆(代下 11:18)
2) 以實瑪利的女兒, 以掃的妻子(創 28:9)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
玛哈拉 这个阴性专有名词在原文的意思是 "弦乐器"
1) 大卫儿子耶利摩的女儿, 大卫孙子罗波安的大老婆(代下 11:18)
2) 以实玛利的女儿, 以扫的妻子(创 28:9)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A woman of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ch.11.18;
daughter of: Jerimoth (H3406N) and Abihail (H0032J); married to Rehoboam (H7346);
mother of: Jeush (H3266K), Shemariah (H8114H), Zaham (H2093)
§ Mahalath = "stringed instrument"
1) daughter of Jerimoth son of king David and wife, evidently the 1st, of king Rehoboam the grandson of king David
2) daughter of Ishmael and wife of Esau
